subject: CSS
question:
If we have an element "card" rotated on Y axis, what element we give perspective:1500px to make the card to show with the 3d perspective effect, child or parent?
Additionally, what other requirement we should meet in order to work properly?
answer: The parent should have the perspective property to show its child with the 3d effect. In addition, the parent and the rotated element should have same dimensions on order to have a consistent behaviour, different sizes make the card to crop on the corners.
